title: Colombo → Kandy
description: Express bus service running every 30 minutes. Comfortable seating with air conditioning. Estimated journey time: 3 hours.

title: Galle → Jaffna
description: Long scenic train ride along the beautiful Sri Lankan coast. Experience breathtaking views and local culture. Journey time: 10 hours.

title: Negombo → Ella
description: Daily bus service to the hill country. Stops at major towns along the route. Journey time: 6 hours.

title: Colombo → Galle
description: Coastal train route with stunning ocean views. Popular among tourists. Multiple departures daily. Journey time: 2.5 hours.

title: Kandy → Nuwara Eliya
description: Mountain route through tea plantations. Cool climate and scenic beauty. Journey time: 2.5 hours.

title: Colombo → Anuradhapura
description: Early morning express train to the ancient city. Reserved seating recommended. Journey time: 4 hours.

title: Matara → Trincomalee
description: Cross-country route connecting south to east coast. Limited service on weekends only. Journey time: 8 hours.

title: Colombo → Badulla
description: One of the most scenic train journeys in the world. Passes through mountains, tea estates, and waterfalls. Journey time: 9 hours.
